import React from 'react' import './style.css' var base64 = require('base-64'); const bcrypt = require('bcryptjs') class SignUp extends React.Component { state = { username: '', password: '', first_name: '', last_name: '', view: 'password' } render() { let id = base64.encode(`first-name: ${this.state.first_name}`) if (this.state.first_name !== '') { alert(id) let decodedId = base64.decode(id) alert(decodedId) } if (window.location === '/signup') { return (

Sign Up











Please Read Before Signing Up


You will not forsure get an account.
This form will be sent to the team of developers and
we will consider giving you an account.
Thank you for visiting,
Sholom Jacks, chief of development.



Sign Up
) } else { return (

Thank you for your submission

) } } } export default SignUp
